title: The little chimney sweep
creator_credit: Primrose Productions, Louis Hagen, Richard Kaplan and Lotte Reiniger
brief_description: An example of Lotte Reiniger’s early silhouette films, re-cut and given a new sountrack. Tells the tale of a little chimney sweep from 18th century London who comes down the wrong chimney and meets a rich young heiress.
creator_credit_for_label: Primrose Productions, Louis Hagen, Richard Kaplan and Lotte Reiniger
